TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Ngudra-drekai, title = Ngudra-drekai, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ngudra-drekai} }

S.FORM: Ngudra-drekai(新富社區Rukai部落) Itiniay i Jinfeng Cen no Taitung ko Ngudra-drekai a niyaro', 113 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 344 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 98% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 338 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 2% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 6 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko .

Ngodra-drekai(新富社區Rokai部落) Itiniay i Jinfeng Cen no Taitong ko Ngodra-drekai a niyaro', 113 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 344 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 98% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 338 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 2% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 6 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko .
